# A One-Man Disinformation Army Out of Russia

## A Disome Navy, John Mark Dougan, a former deputy sheriff in Palm Beach County, Fla., sent a warning last week to the president of the country's post office.

He later masqueraded online as a Russian agent working with a pseudonym, BaDoViT, to leak confidential information to Russian officials at state law, federal agencies and state House, though they were dealing with a foreigner.

Dougan, who frequently flew over Russia, was arrested in New York City by the FBI on Friday.

The FBI's top official, who was not identified, was quoted in a statement by the FBI.

The FBI's top official, who was not identified, was quoted in a statement by the F.B.I.
